00031 #ifndef _VEHICLE_H_
00032 #define _VEHICLE_H_
00033 
00034 #include "Debug.nxc"
00035 #include "Angle.nxc"
00036 #include "Vector.nxc"
00037 #include "Circle.nxc"
00038 #include "Odometer2.nxc"

00041 #define VEHICLE_MAX_POWER_DEFAULT 60
00042 #define VEHICLE_MIN_POWER_DEFAULT 25
00043 #define VEHICLE_ACCEL_DEFAULT 3  /* Acceleration */
00044 #define VEHICLE_BRAKE_DEFAULT 10 /* Deceleration */
00045 #define VEHICLE_MAX_STEERING_FACTOR_DEFAULT 60
00046 #define VEHICLE_STABILITY_FACTOR_DEFAULT 210  /* Max 3 steer factor at 90 power */
00047 #define VEHICLE_LOOKAHEAD_DISTANCE_DEFAULT 20 /* Look ahead distance 20 cm */
00048 
00052 struct Vehicle
00053 {
00054     int maxPower;             
00055     int minPower;             
00056     int accelPower;           
00057     int brakePower;           
00058     int currentPower;         
00059     int maxSteerFactor;       
00060     int currentSteerFactor;   
00061     int stabilityFactor;      
00062     int motorLeft;            
00063     int motorRight;           
00064     Odometer2 odometer;       
00065     Vector navPointsQueue[];  
00066     int navPoint;             
00067     int navPointLast;         
00068     int maxNavPoints;         
00069     int lookaheadDistance;    
00070     Vector lastMoveVector;    
00071     bool pause;               
00072 };
00073 
00078 void VehicleInit(Vehicle &vehicle, Odometer2 &odometer, int maxNavPoints)
00079 {
00080     vehicle.maxPower = VEHICLE_MAX_POWER_DEFAULT;
00081     vehicle.minPower = VEHICLE_MIN_POWER_DEFAULT;
00082     vehicle.accelPower = VEHICLE_ACCEL_DEFAULT;
00083     vehicle.brakePower = VEHICLE_BRAKE_DEFAULT;
00084     vehicle.currentPower = 0;
00085     vehicle.maxSteerFactor = VEHICLE_MAX_STEERING_FACTOR_DEFAULT;
00086     vehicle.currentSteerFactor = 0;
00087     vehicle.stabilityFactor = VEHICLE_STABILITY_FACTOR_DEFAULT;
00088     vehicle.motorLeft = odometer.leftWheelMotor;
00089     vehicle.motorRight = odometer.rightWheelMotor;
00090 
00091     ArrayInit(vehicle.navPointsQueue, 0, maxNavPoints);
00092     vehicle.navPoint = 0;
00093     vehicle.navPointLast = 0;
00094     vehicle.maxNavPoints = maxNavPoints;
00095     vehicle.pause = false;
00096     vehicle.odometer = odometer;
00097     VectorInit(vehicle.lastMoveVector, 0, 0, 0);
00098     vehicle.lookaheadDistance = VEHICLE_LOOKAHEAD_DISTANCE_DEFAULT;
00099 }
00100 
00112 void VehicleSetDynamics(Vehicle &vehicle, int minPower, int maxPower,
00113                         int powerAtSteer, int steerAtPower, int maxSteerFactor)
00114 {
00115     vehicle.minPower = minPower;
00116     vehicle.maxPower = maxPower;
00117     vehicle.stabilityFactor = (powerAtSteer - minPower) * steerAtPower;
00118     vehicle.maxSteerFactor = maxSteerFactor;
00119 }
00120 
00127 void VehicleSetAcceleration(Vehicle &vehicle, int accelerationPerStep,
00128                             int brakingPerStep)
00129 {
00130      vehicle.accelPower = accelerationPerStep;
00131      vehicle.brakePower = brakingPerStep;
00132 }
00133 
00141 void VehicleSetLookaheadDistance(Vehicle &vehicle, int lookaheadDistance)
00142 {
00143     vehicle.lookaheadDistance = lookaheadDistance;
00144 }
00145 
00149 void VehiclePause(Vehicle &vehicle)
00150 {
00151     MotorSetPowerSync(vehicle.motorLeft, vehicle.motorRight, 0);
00152     vehicle.currentPower = 0;
00153     vehicle.pause = true;
00154 }
00155 
00160 void VehicleContinue(Vehicle &vehicle)
00161 {
00162     MotorStartSync(vehicle.motorLeft, vehicle.motorRight, 0);
00163     vehicle.pause = false;
00164 }
00165 
00171 void VehicleAddNavPoint(Vehicle &vehicle, Vector &navPoint)
00172 {
00173     if (vehicle.navPointLast >= vehicle.maxNavPoints)
00174         vehicle.navPointLast = 0;
00175     vehicle.navPointsQueue[vehicle.navPointLast] = navPoint;
00176     vehicle.navPointLast++;
00177 
00178     /* Start drive */
00179     MotorStartSync(vehicle.motorLeft, vehicle.motorRight, 0);
00180 }
00181 
00187 void VehicleAddNavPoints(Vehicle &vehicle, Vector &navPoints[])
00188 {
00189     int arryLen = ArrayLen(navPoints);
00190     for (int i = 0; i < arryLen; i++)
00191     {
00192         if (vehicle.navPointLast >= vehicle.maxNavPoints)
00193             vehicle.navPointLast = 0;
00194 
00195         Vector v = navPoints[i];
00196         vehicle.navPointsQueue[vehicle.navPointLast] = v;
00197         vehicle.navPointLast++;
00198     }
00199     /* Start drive */
00200     if (arryLen > 0)
00201         MotorStartSync(vehicle.motorLeft, vehicle.motorRight, 0);
00202 }
00203 
00212 long VehicleSteerToAngle(Vehicle &vehicle, int approachAngle)
00213 {
00214      long wheelRotation = (approachAngle * vehicle.odometer.axialLength * 100) /
00215                  (vehicle.odometer.wheelDiameter * vehicle.odometer.gearRatio);
00216      MotorRotateAngleDiff(vehicle.motorLeft, vehicle.motorRight,
00217                           vehicle.maxPower, -wheelRotation, 300, 0, 0);
00218 
00219      /* Update odometer after the steer */
00220      Odometer2Step(vehicle.odometer);
00221 }
00222 
00239 void VehicleUpdatePowerAndSteer(Vehicle &vehicle, int requestedSteerFactor)
00240 {
00241     long steerPower, allowedSteerFactor;
00242     long absSteerFactor = Abs(requestedSteerFactor);
00243     
00244      /* Avoid divide by 0. If steer factor is 0 (i.e. go straight) assign
00245       * maximum power for the allowable steering power. Otherwise, calculate
00246       * it from the stability factor.
00247       */
00248     if (absSteerFactor > 0)
00249         steerPower = vehicle.minPower + vehicle.stabilityFactor/absSteerFactor;
00250     else
00251         steerPower = vehicle.maxPower;
00252     
00253     /* Update power based on requested steerFactor. If allowable power is
00254      * is greater than current power, the steering can easily happen and
00255      * also the motors can increase their powers -- accelerate slowly.
00256      */
00257     if (steerPower > vehicle.currentPower)
00258     {
00259         vehicle.currentPower += vehicle.accelPower;
00260         if (vehicle.currentPower > vehicle.maxPower)
00261             vehicle.currentPower = vehicle.maxPower;
00262 
00263     }
00264     /* Otherwise, if allowable power is less than current power, deccelerate
00265      * to reach the allowed power for making necessary steering.
00266      */
00267     else if (steerPower < vehicle.currentPower)
00268     {
00269         vehicle.currentPower -= vehicle.brakePower;
00270         if (vehicle.currentPower < 0)
00271             vehicle.currentPower = 0;
00272     }
00273     
00274     /* Determine the limit of steering that can be safely done on current power */
00275     long powerDiff = (vehicle.currentPower - vehicle.minPower);
00276     if (powerDiff <= 0)
00277        allowedSteerFactor = vehicle.maxSteerFactor;
00278     else
00279        allowedSteerFactor = vehicle.stabilityFactor/powerDiff;
00280     if (allowedSteerFactor > vehicle.maxSteerFactor)
00281        allowedSteerFactor = vehicle.maxSteerFactor;
00282 
00283     /* Pick whichever is minimum, the request steering or currently safe
00284      * steering calculated above based on current power.
00285      */
00286     if (absSteerFactor > allowedSteerFactor)
00287     {
00288         /* Requested steering factor is above the limit possible with current
00289          * power, so use the limit instead while the vehicle decelarates.
00290          */
00291         vehicle.currentSteerFactor = allowedSteerFactor;
00292 
00293         /* Correct current steering factor sign */
00294         if (requestedSteerFactor <= 0)
00295             vehicle.currentSteerFactor = -vehicle.currentSteerFactor;
00296     }
00297     else
00298     {
00299         /* Requested steering factor is within the limit of current power
00300          * so use it directly.
00301          */
00302         vehicle.currentSteerFactor = requestedSteerFactor;
00303     }
00304 
00305     /* Apply the powers to wheels */
00306     MotorSetTurnRatioPower(vehicle.motorLeft, vehicle.motorRight,
00307                            vehicle.currentSteerFactor,
00308                            vehicle.currentPower);
00309 
00310 }
00311 
00316 void LineProjectPoint(Vector a, Vector b, Vector p, Vector &ret)
00317 {
00318     long dsqr =  VectorGetDistanceVec(a, b);
00319     dsqr *= dsqr;
00320     long u = ((p.x - a.x) * (b.x - a.x) + (p.y - a.y) * (b.y - a.y))/dsqr;
00321     ret.x = a.x + u * (b.x - a.x);
00322     ret.y = a.y + u * (b.y - a.y);
00323     ret.theta = 0;
00324 }
00325 
00336 bool VehicleGetLookahead(Vehicle &vehicle, Vector &lookahead)
00337 {
00338     Vector currentPoint, moveVector;
00339     Vector intersect1, intersect2;
00340     bool result;
00341 
00342     if (vehicle.navPoint == vehicle.navPointLast)
00343     {
00344         /* Vehicle has no currently targeted navigation point */
00345         return false;
00346     }
00347     
00348     Odometer2GetCumulativePosition(vehicle.odometer, currentPoint);
00349     VectorReduce(currentPoint, 10); /* Reduce to cm */
00350     
00351     moveVector = vehicle.navPointsQueue[vehicle.navPoint];
00352     result = CircleIntersectLine(currentPoint, vehicle.lookaheadDistance,
00353                                  vehicle.lastMoveVector, moveVector,
00354                                  intersect1, intersect2);
00355     if (result == true)
00356     {
00357         /* Pick the intersection point closer to move vector */
00358         long d1 = VectorGetDistanceVec(moveVector, intersect1);
00359         long d2 = VectorGetDistanceVec(moveVector, intersect2);
00360         if (d1 < d2) lookahead = intersect1;
00361         else lookahead = intersect2;
00362     }
00363     else
00364     {
00365         /* If we don't get a lookahead circle intersection, find a projected
00366          * target on the path to follow
00367          */
00368         LineProjectPoint(vehicle.lastMoveVector, moveVector,
00369                          currentPoint, intersect1);
00370         intersect2 = intersect1;
00371     }
00372     return true;
00373 }
00374 
00384 int VehicleStep(Vehicle &vehicle)
00385 {
00386     long PAngle = 50;
00387     Vector currentPoint, moveVector, lookahead;
00388 
00389     if(vehicle.navPoint == vehicle.navPointLast)
00390     {
00391         MotorStopSync(vehicle.motorLeft, vehicle.motorRight);
00392         /* Nowhere to move */
00393         return false;
00394     }
00395 
00396     /* Check pause */
00397     if (vehicle.pause == true)
00398     {
00399         /* Step must be continued */
00400         return true;
00401     }
00402 
00403     Odometer2Step(vehicle.odometer);
00404     Odometer2GetCumulativePosition(vehicle.odometer, currentPoint);
00405     VectorReduce(currentPoint, 10); /* Convert to cm */
00406     
00407     moveVector = vehicle.navPointsQueue[vehicle.navPoint];
00408 
00409     /* Determine distance to destination */
00410     long distanceToTravel = VectorGetDistanceVec(currentPoint, moveVector);
00411 
00412     /* If current move vector is reached, move on to next vector */
00413     if (distanceToTravel < vehicle.lookaheadDistance)
00414     {
00415         vehicle.navPoint++;
00416         vehicle.lastMoveVector = moveVector;
00417 
00418         /* Step must be continued */
00419         return true;
00420     }
00421 
00422     /* Look ahead and find the direction of heading */
00423     VehicleGetLookahead(vehicle, lookahead);
00424 
00425     /* Determine move angle (0 .. 360), which is the (absolute) target
00426      * angle to which vehicle is to be steered.
00427      */
00428     long moveAngle = VectorGetAngleVec(currentPoint, lookahead);
00429 
00430     /* Determine approach angle (0 .. 360) from vehicle's orientation */
00431     long approachAngle = AngleAbsSub(moveAngle, currentPoint.theta);
00432 
00433     /* Determine approachAngle relative -180 .. 180 */
00434     approachAngle = AngleAbsToRel(approachAngle);
00435 
00436     long steerFactor = (approachAngle * PAngle)/100;
00437     if (steerFactor > vehicle.maxSteerFactor)
00438         steerFactor = vehicle.maxSteerFactor;
00439     else if (steerFactor < -vehicle.maxSteerFactor)
00440         steerFactor = -vehicle.maxSteerFactor;
00441 
00442     VehicleUpdatePowerAndSteer(vehicle, steerFactor);
00443 
00444     /* Step must be continued */
00445     return true;
00446 }

00448 /* Tests */
00449 #ifdef ENABLE_TEST
00450 #include "RobotPrima.nxc"
00451 
00452 void TestVehicle()
00453 {
00454     Vehicle theVehicle;
00455     Odometer2 wheelBase;
00456     Vector point;
00457 
00458     /* Initialize vehicle */
00459     Odometer2Init(wheelBase, OUT_B, OUT_C,
00460                   PRIMA_WHEEL_AXIAL_LENGTH,
00461                   PRIMA_WHEEL_DIAMETER,
00462                   PRIMA_WHEEL_GEAR_RATIO,
00463                   0,     /* Initial left tacho count */
00464                   0,     /* Initial right tacho count */
00465                   true,  /* enable dx calculation */
00466                   true); /* enable delta calculation */
00467     VehicleInit(theVehicle, wheelBase, PRIMA_MAX_NAV_POINTS);
00468 
00469     /* Set navigation path */
00470 
00471     VectorInit(point, 100, 0, 0);
00472     VehicleAddNavPoint(theVehicle, point);
00473     VectorInit(point, 100, 50, 0);
00474     VehicleAddNavPoint(theVehicle, point);
00475     VectorInit(point, 0, 50, 0);
00476     VehicleAddNavPoint(theVehicle, point);
00477     VectorInit(point, 0, 0, 0);
00478     VehicleAddNavPoint(theVehicle, point);
00479     VectorInit(point, 30, 50, 0);
00480     VehicleAddNavPoint(theVehicle, point);
00481     VectorInit(point, 70, -50, 0);
00482     VehicleAddNavPoint(theVehicle, point);
00483     VectorInit(point, 100, 0, 0);
00484     VehicleAddNavPoint(theVehicle, point);
00485     VectorInit(point, 50, -20, 0);
00486     VehicleAddNavPoint(theVehicle, point);
00487     VectorInit(point, 0, 0, 0);
00488     VehicleAddNavPoint(theVehicle, point);
00489 
00490     while(VehicleStep(theVehicle)) Wait(50);
00491 }
00492 
00493 #endif /* ENABLE_TEST */
